explains: n. 热情；热烈；热心；炽热

sentences.en: In many such cases, he uses bifurcation to express a kind of fervor or even a fury that's comparable to the moral denunciations he criticizes.
sentences.cn: 在很多这样的例子中，他使用分歧来表达一种热情，或甚至暴怒，其程度堪比他所批评的道德谴责。

sentences.en: Any of my dog's sad eyes always stirs the fervor in my heart.
sentences.cn: 爱犬悲伤的眼神总会激起我心中的热情。

sentences.en: Never be lacking in zeal, but keep your spiritual fervor, serving the Lord.
sentences.cn: 永不缺乏热情，但你要心中火热，服侍主。
